This is not merely a number; it's the unfolding narrative of a world grappling with cascading crises. From the 'new face of conflict' in Sudan's civil war, fueled by the 'geopolitics of resources' (Vision of Humanity, Eurasia Review) amidst a 'fragmented geopolitical order,' to the prolonged 'Four Years of War in Europe' (Foreign Policy), direct military engagement continues to destabilize entire regions.
